Name: Puzzle 101: Edge of Galaxy 宇宙边际
About the game: Edge Of Galaxy - very beautiful game of space jigsaw puzzle game! Collect the full image of the different small pieces. You can either play with very relaxing on Casual mode, Customize mode or Challenge Mode with time attack, snapping difficulty, adjustable pieces size and others. Support unique game mode like Day and Night, Rotation, Limited Pick, Blind, Black Hole, Color Layer and Vortex. Game Features Casual Mode Challenge Mode Customize Mode 80 very beautiful images! Leaderboard! Achievement!
